text:
A Timid Encounter

A dim room, Raskolnikov and Sonia face each other.  
A moment of tension hangs in the air.  
Raskolnikov: “I did not expect you.”  
Sonia: “I… I came for one minute.”  
Raskolnikov: “Please, sit down.”  

---

Sonia hesitates, trembling with fear.  
Raskolnikov: “You come from Katerina Ivanovna?”  
Sonia: “Yes, she sent me to beg you…”  
Raskolnikov: “I will try, certainly.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov feels a sudden pang of sympathy for Sonia, who appears humiliated and terrified as she seeks his presence on behalf of Katerina Ivanovna.
